name: tsdist-zig
readme:
# Time Series Distances Zig Library

A Zig library for calculating distances between time series, including Euclidean, Manhattan, Chebyshev, LCSS and EDR distances.
owner_bio: UNIX Systems Engineer and Technical Writer. Author of Go Systems Programming, Mastering Go (https://t.co/O2YuWr6ZnR) and Time Series Indexing.
